Equation: $\frac{1}{ | c_x \cup c_z | } \sum\limits_{y \in c_x \cup c_z} { min(|c_x \cup c_y|,|c_y \cup c_z|) }$
$\sum\limits_{y \in c_x \cup c_z} { | c_x \cup c_y | \times | c_y \cup c_z | }$
$1 - \prod\limits_{y \in c_x \cup c_z} {1 - D(x,y)D(y,z)}$~$D(i,j) = max(P(i|j),P(j|i))$~$P(i|j) = | c_i \cup c_j | / | s_j |$
